summary:
As Managing Director I am responsible to develop the  domestic business with existing and new customers in the market. These are exciting times as our world of Industrial Automation is changing so fast, thanks to the digital transformation, requiring us to continuously develop further and aiming to Co-Create value with our customers. We aim to support our customers, helping them to achieve more in business, with their customers and partners, whereas at the same time we are on a serious mission to contribute more to the United Nations Sustainable development goals. 

In particular the energy transition and circular economy activities (waste management, plastics2chemicals) are topics close to my hearth.

We like to do this with our customers and partners in order to achieve a better, more efficient and sustainable future for all.

Project Management
Program Management
Sales Management
(Strategic) Account Management
General Management
Country Management
Risk Management
Business planning and realization
Company Strategy and Balance Scorecard

Specialties: Focus on getting things done
